item.title: I AM the boarding craft!
item.description: This week on Sunshine and Frank: World of Warcraft gains back 2.6 million subscribers, Red vs Blue wraps up its 12th season, Far Cry 4 releases, and more; we discuss Star Citizen’s damage model, permadeath, and what happens to your character when you get captured.
